name: contingency_property_investigation_days
title: Within how many days after Acceptance will you remove the Property Investigation contingency?
label: Investigation Days
description: This applies because you chose not to waive this contingency.
tips: This pertains to investigations and inspections for the property and is typically completed no later than 17 days after acceptance of your offer.
small_print: Schedule inspections of the property promptly to ensure completion before the contingency removal deadline. Should anything be revealed that you'd like to negotiate with the seller, all negotiations will need to happen before the contingency period ends.

contingency_property_investigation_days.name: contingency_property_investigation_days

suggested.hint: Anything greater than 17 days may make your offer less competitive.
